scripts.migrate: python manage.py makemigrations && python manage.py migrate
scripts.setup: python manage.py makemigrations && python manage.py migrate && python manage.py createsuperuser --noinput && npm install
scripts.server: npm run bundlejs && python manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0:3000
scripts.everything: concurrently "python manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0:3000" "python bot_manager/bot_runner.py" "parcel static/js/index.js --out-dir static/dist --public-url /static/dist --hmr-port 1235"
